title: Why you should have an online presence as a developer in 2023
intro: Being a developer is exciting. You made couple of projects, contributed to open-source, but what else. What else can you do with your time to be better. While every programmer has done most of the above mentioned activities, not all have a good online presence. …

title: Why you must have a portfolio site for yourself
intro: So you made a couple of really exciting projects, contributed to open-source, etc but how does one know all this about you. One won’t search for your username at all the places to map what you did. That’s what the portfolio site is for. One place that lists all your…

title: Project to build for yourself as a developer
intro: Okay so you are a developer and have built a lot of projects. But wait you forgot yourself in the process. You built software to help the world but what about you. Did you build anything specifically for yourself? No? Then what are you waiting for? You have the skills…
